pa nyid du 'byung ngo // sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ bsam gtan rnams la spyod pa'i tshe/ bsam gtan de dag mi dmigs shing / yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems

dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo // sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/

tshad med pa rnams la spyod pa'i tshe/ tshad med pa de dag mi dmigs shing / yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ rnam pa

thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo // sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la spyod pa'i tshe/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag mi dmigs shing / yang dag par rjes su mi

mthong ste/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo // sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa'

sems dpa' chen po/ rnam par thar pa rnams la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam par thar pa de dag mi dmigs shing / yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/

mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo // sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la spyod pa'i tshe/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug

pa dgu po de dag mi dmigs shing / yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid

du 'byung ngo // sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa

med pa de dag mi dmigs shing / yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen

pa nyid du 'byung ngo // sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ mngon par shes pa rnams la spyod pa'i tshe/ mngon par shes pa de dag mi dmigs shing / yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems

dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo // sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ ting nge 'dzin rnams la

spyod pa'i tshe/ ting nge 'dzin de dag mi dmigs shing / yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ rnam pa thams

cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo // sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams la spyod pa'i tshe/ gzungs kyi sgo de dag mi dmigs shing yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa'

sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo // sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la

spyod pa'i tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu po de dag mi dmigs shing / yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/

mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo // sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi la spyod pa'i tshe/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi po de dag mi dmigs shing / yang dag par rjes su mi

mthong ste/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo // sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa'

sems dpa' chen po/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la spyod pa'i tshe/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi po de dag mi dmigs shing / yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol

tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo // sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ snying rje chen po la spyod pa'i tshe/ snying rje chen po de mi dmigs shing / yang dag par

rjes su mi mthong ste/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo // sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems

dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la spyod pa'i tshe/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa de dag mi dmigs shing / yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/

shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo // sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ thams cad shes pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ thams cad

shes pa nyid de mi dmigs shing / yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa

nyid du 'byung ngo // sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid de mi dmigs shing / yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems

dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo // sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ rnam pa thams

cad mkhyen pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid de mi dmigs shing / yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs

pa'i tshul gyis/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo // sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i

tshul gyis/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo // gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ba lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ nang stong

pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / phyi stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / chen po stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i

tshul dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / thog ma

dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid mi

dmigs pa'i tshul dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul

gyis/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar shes par bya'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las/ le'u drug go// / de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ bcom ldan 'das

la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das la la zhig 'di skad du 'dri zhing / ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa

nyid thob par 'gyur ram/ zhes mchis na/ bcom ldan 'das de skad du 'dri ba de la/ ji skad du bstan par bgyi// bcom ldan 'das la la zhig la 'di skad du 'dri zhing / ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs shing /

rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram zhes mchi na/ bcom ldan 'das de skad du 'dri ba de la ji skad du bstan par bgyi// bcom ldan 'das la la zhig 'di skad du 'dri zhing / ci

sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram zhes mchi na/ bcom ldan 'das de skad du 'dri ba de la

ji skad du bstan par bgyi// bcom ldan 'das la la zhig 'di skad du 'dri zhing / ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid

thob par 'gyur ram zhes mchi na/ bcom ldan 'das de skad du 'dri ba de la ji skad du bstan par bgyi// bcom ldan 'das la la zhig 'di skad du 'dri zhing / ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs shing / rnam pa

thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram zhes mchi na/ bcom ldan 'das de skad du 'dri ba de la ji skad du bstan par bgyi// bcom ldan 'das la la zhig 'di skad du 'dri zhing / ci sgyu

ma'i skyes bu 'di/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram zhes mchi na/ bcom ldan 'das de skad du 'dri ba de la ji skad du

bstan par bgyi// bcom ldan 'das la la zhig 'di skad du 'dri zhing / ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di/ nang stong pa nyid la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur

ram zhes mchi na/ bcom ldan 'das de skad du 'dri ba de la ji skad du bstan par bgyi// bcom ldan 'das la la zhig 'di skad du 'dri zhing / ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di/ phyi stong pa nyid la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams

cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram zhes mchi na/ bcom ldan 'das de skad du 'dri ba de la ji skad du bstan par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das la la zhig 'di skad du 'dri zhing / ci sgyu ma'i

skyes bu 'di/ phyi nang stong pa nyid la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram zhes mchi na/ bcom ldan 'das de skad du 'dri ba de la ji skad du bstan

par bgyi// bcom ldan 'das la la zhig 'di skad du 'dri zhing / ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur

ram zhes mchi na/ bcom ldan 'das de skad du 'dri ba de la ji skad du bstan par bgyi// bcom ldan 'das la la zhig 'di skad du 'dri zhing / ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di/ chen po stong pa nyid la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du

'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram zhes mchi na/ bcom ldan 'das de skad du 'dri ba de la ji skad du bstan par bgyi// bcom ldan 'das la la zhig 'di skad du 'dri zhing / ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di/ don dam pa

stong pa nyid la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram zhes mchi na/ bcom ldan 'das de skad du 'dri ba de la ji skad du bstan par bgyi// bcom ldan 'das la la zhig

'di skad du 'dri zhing / ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram zhes mchi na/ bcom ldan 'das de skad du 'dri

ba de la ji skad du bstan par bgyi// bcom ldan 'das la la zhig 'di skad du 'dri zhing / ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa

nyid thob par 'gyur ram/ zhes mchi na/ bcom ldan 'das de skad du 'dri ba de la ji skad du bstan par bgyi// bcom ldan 'das la la zhig 'di skad du 'dri zhing / ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la bslabs shing /

rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram zhes mchi na/ bcom ldan 'das de skad du 'dri ba de la ji skad du bstan par bgyi// bcom ldan 'das la la zhig 'di skad du 'dri zhing / ci sgyu ma'i

skyes bu 'di/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram zhes mchi na/ bcom ldan 'das de skad du 'dri ba de la ji skad du

bstan par bgyi// bcom ldan 'das la la zhig 'di skad du 'dri zhing / ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur

ram zhes mchi na/ bcom ldan 'das de skad du 'dri ba de la ji skad du bstan par bgyi// bcom ldan 'das la la zhig 'di skad du 'dri zhing / ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du

'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram zhes mchi na/ bcom ldan 'das de skad du 'dri ba de la ji skad du bstan par bgyi// bcom ldan 'das la la zhig 'di skad du 'dri zhing / ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di

chos thams cad stong pa nyid la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram/ zhes mchi na/ bcom ldan 'das de skad du 'dri ba de la ji skad du bstan par bgyi//

bcom ldan 'das la la zhig 'di skad du 'dri zhing / ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram zhes mchi

na/ bcom ldan 'das de skad du 'dri ba de la ji skad du bstan par bgyi// bcom ldan 'das la la zhig 'di skad du 'dri zhing / ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di/ pa stong pa nyid la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar

'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram zhes mchi na/ bcom ldan 'das de skad du 'dri ba de la ji skad du bstan par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das la la zhig 'di skad du 'dri zhing / ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di/ dngos po med

pa stong pa nyid la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram zhes mchi na/ bcom ldan 'das de skad du 'dri ba de la ji skad du bstan par bgyi// bcom ldan 'das

la la zhig 'di skad du 'dri zhing / ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram zhes mchi na/ bcom ldan 'das de

skad du 'dri ba de la ji skad du bstan par bgyi// bcom ldan 'das la la zhig 'di skad du 'dri zhing / ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams

cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram zhes mchi na/ bcom ldan 'das de skad du 'dri ba de la ji skad du bstan par bgyi// bcom ldan 'das la la zhig 'di skad du 'dri zhing / ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la bslabs

shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram zhes mchi na/ bcom ldan 'das de skad du 'dri ba de la ji skad du bstan par bgyi// bcom ldan 'das la la zhig 'di skad du 'dri

zhing / ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di/ yang dag par spong ba rnams la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram zhes mchi na/ bcom ldan 'das de skad du 'dri ba de

la ji skad du bstan par bgyi// bcom ldan 'das la la zhig 'di skad du 'dri zhing / ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad

mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram zhes mchi na/ bcom ldan 'das de skad du 'dri ba de la ji skad du bstan par bgyi// bcom ldan 'das la la zhig 'di skad du 'dri zhing / ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di/ dbang po rnams la bslabs shing /

rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram zhes mchi na/ bcom ldan 'das de skad du 'dri ba de la ji skad du bstan par bgyi// bcom ldan 'das la la zhig 'di skad du

'dri zhing / ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di/ stobs rnams la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram zhes mchi na/ bcom ldan 'das de

skad du 'dri ba de la ji skad du bstan par bgyi// bcom ldan 'das la la zhig 'di skad du 'dri zhing / ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad

mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram zhes mchi na/ bcom ldan 'das de skad du 'dri ba de la ji skad du bstan par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das la la zhig 'di skad du 'dri zhing / ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad

pa la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram zhes mchi na/ bcom ldan 'das de skad du 'dri ba de la ji skad du bstan par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das la la

zhig 'di skad du 'dri zhing / ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram zhes mchi na/ bcom ldan

'das de skad du 'dri ba de la ji skad du bstan par bgyi// bcom ldan 'das la la zhig 'di skad du 'dri zhing / ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di/ bsam gtan rnams la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa

thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram zhes mchi na/ bcom ldan 'das de skad du 'dri ba de la ji skad du bstan par bgyi// bcom ldan 'das la la zhig 'di skad du 'dri zhing / ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di tshad med pa rnams la bslabs shing /

rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram zhes mchi na/ bcom ldan 'das de skad du 'dri ba de la ji skad du bstan par bgyi// bcom ldan 'das la la zhig 'di skad du 'dri zhing / ci

sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di/ gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram/ zhes mchi na/ bcom ldan 'das de skad du 'di

ba de la ji skad du bstan par bgyi// bcom ldan 'das la la zhig 'di skad du 'dri zhing / ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di/ rnam pa thar pa brgyad la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob

par 'gyur ram zhes mchi na/ bcom ldan 'das de skad du 'dri ba de la ji skad du bstan par bgyi// bcom ldan 'das la la zhig 'di skad du 'dri zhing / ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la bslabs

shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram zhes mchi na/ bcom ldan 'das de skad du 'dri bde la ji skad du bstan par bgyi// bcom ldan 'das la la zhig 'di skad du

'dri zhing / ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa pa la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram

zhes mchi na/ bcom ldan 'das de skad du 'dri ba de la ji skad du bstan par bgyi// bcom ldan 'das la la zhig 'di skad du 'dri zhing / ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di/ mngon par shes pa rnams la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du

'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram zhes mchi na/ bcom ldan 'das de skad du 'dri ba de la ji skad du bstan par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das la la zhig 'di skad du 'dri zhing / ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di

ting nge 'dzin rnams la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram zhes mchi na/ bcom ldan 'das de skad du 'dri ba de la ji skad du bstan par bgyi// bcom ldan 'das la

la zhig 'di skad du 'dri zhing / ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram zhes mchi na/ bcom ldan 'das

de skad du 'dri ba de la ji skad du bstan par bgyi// bcom ldan 'das la la zhig 'di skad du 'dri zhing / ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam

pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram zhes mchi na/ bcom ldan 'das de skad du 'dri ba de la ji skad du bstan par bgyi// bcom ldan 'das la la zhig 'di skad du 'dri zhing / ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di/ mi 'jigs pa rnams la bslabs shing

rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram zhes mchi na/ bcom ldan 'das de skad du 'dri ba de la ji skad du bstan par bgyi// bcom ldan 'das la la zhig 'di skad du 'dri zhing /

ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram zhes mchi na/ bcom ldan 'das de skad du 'dri ba de la ji skad du

bstan par bgyi// bcom ldan 'das la la zhig 'di skad du 'dri zhing / ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di/ snying rje chen po la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram

zhes mchi na/ bcom ldan 'das de skad du 'dri ba de la ji skad du bstan par bgyi// bcom ldan 'das la la zhig 'di skad du 'dri zhing / ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa

nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram/ zhes mchi na/ bcom ldan 'das de skad du 'dri ba de la ji skad du bstan par bgyi// de skad ces gsol pa dang // bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la

'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rab 'byor de lta bas na/ de khyod nyid la dris/ khyod kyis ji ltar bzod pa de ltar lung ston cig/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ gzugs kyang gzhan la sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam// gsol pa/

bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ tshor ba yang gzhan la/ sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom

ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ 'du shes kyang gzhan la/ sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab

'byor de ji snyam du sems/ 'du byed kyang gzhan la sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ rnam par shes
pa yang gzhan la/ sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ mig kyang gzhan la sgyu ma

yang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ rna ba yang gzhan la/ sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam// gsol pa/

lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ dbang po rnams kyang gzhan la/ sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis

bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ stobs rnams kyang gzhan la/ sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam

du sems/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyang gzhan la/ sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ 'phags pa'i

lam yan lag brgyad pa yang gzhan la/ sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams

kyang gzhan la/ sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ bsam gtan rnams kyang gzhan la/ sgyu ma yang gzhan

zhig yin snyam mam// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ tshad med pa rnams kyang gzhan la/ sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/

gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang gzhan la/ sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam// gsol pa/ bcom

ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ rnam par thar pa brgyad kyang gzhan la/ sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so//

bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yang gzhan la/ sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom

ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa yang gzhan la/ sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma

lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ mngon par shes pa rnams kyang gzhan la/ sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das

kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ ting nge 'dzin rnams kyang gzhan la/ sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam

du sems/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyang gzhan la/ sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i

stobs rnams kyang gzhan la/ sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ mi 'jigs pa rnams kyang gzhan la/ sgyu ma

yang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyang gzhan la/ sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin

snyam mam// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ snying rje chen po yang gzhan la/ sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam// gsol pa/ bcom ldan

'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad kyang gzhan la/ sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de
lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ byang chub kyang gzhan la/ sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// //

shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po bcu bdun pa// bcom ldan 'das gzugs kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ gzugs nyid kyang sgyu ma sgyu ma nyid kyang gzugs so//

bcom ldan 'das tshor ba yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ tshor ba nyid kyang sgyu ma sgyu ma nyid kyang tshor ba'o// bcom ldan 'das 'du shes kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/

'du shes nyid kyang sgyu ma sgyu ma nyid kyang 'du shes so// bcom ldan 'das 'du byed kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ 'du byed nyid kyang sgyu ma sgyu ma nyid kyang 'du byed do// bcom ldan 'das rnam par shes pa yang gzhan

ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ rnam par shes pa nyid kyang sgyu ma sgyu ma nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'o// bcom ldan 'das mig kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ mig nyid kyang sgyu ma sgyu ma nyid kyang mig go//

bcom ldan 'das rna ba yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ rna ba nyid kyang sgyu ma sgyu ma nyid kyang rna ba'o// bcom ldan 'das sna yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ sna nyid kyang sgyu ma sgyu ma nyid kyang sna'o// bcom

ldan 'das lce yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ lce nyid kyang sgyu ma sgyu ma nyid kyang lce'o// bcom ldan 'das lus kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ lus nyid kyang sgyu ma sgyu ma nyid kyang lus so// bcom

ldan 'das yid kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ yid nyid kyang sgyu ma sgyu ma nyid kyang yid do// bcom ldan 'das gzugs kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ gzugs nyid kyang sgyu ma sgyu ma nyid kyang gzugs

so// bcom ldan 'das sgra yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ sgra nyid kyang sgyu ma sgyu ma nyid kyang sgra'o// bcom ldan 'das dri yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ dri nyid kyang sgyu ma sgyu ma nyid kyang dri'o//

bcom ldan 'das ro yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ ro nyid kyang sgyu ma sgyu ma nyid kyang ro'o// bcom ldan 'das reg kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ reg nyid kyang sgyu ma sgyu ma nyid kyang reg go//

bcom ldan 'das chos kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ chos nyid kyang sgyu ma sgyu ma nyid kyang chos so// bcom ldan 'das mig gi rnam par shes pa yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ mig gi rnam

par shes pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang mig gi rnam par shes pa'o// bcom ldan 'das rna ba'i rnam par shes pa yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa nyid kyang sgyu ma sgyu ma nyid kyang rna ba'i rnam par shes

pa'o// bcom ldan 'das sna'i rnam par shes pa yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ sna'i rnam par shes pa nyid kyang sgyu ma sgyu ma nyid kyang sna'i rnam par shes pa'o// bcom ldan 'das lce'i rnam par shes pa yang gzhan ma lags/

sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ lce'i rnam par shes pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang lce'i rnam par shes pa'o// bcom ldan 'das lus kyi rnam par shes pa yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa nyid

kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang lus kyi rnam par shes pa'o// bcom ldan 'das yid kyi rnam par shes pa yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang yid kyi rnam par shes pa'o// bcom

ldan 'das mig gi 'dus te reg pa yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang sgyu ma sgyu ma nyid kyang mig gi 'dus te reg pa'o// bcom ldan 'das rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma

yang gzhan ma lags te/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'o// bcom ldan 'das sna'i 'dus te reg pa yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa

nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang sna'i 'dus te reg pa'o// bcom ldan 'das lce'i 'dus te reg pa yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang lce'i 'dus te reg pa'o// bcom

ldan 'das lus kyi 'dus te reg pa yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'o// bcom ldan 'das yid kyi 'dus te reg pa yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu

ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'o// bcom ldan 'das mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ mig gi 'dus

te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'o// bcom ldan 'das rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i

rkyen kyis tshor ba nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'o// bcom ldan 'das sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis

tshor ba nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'o// bcom ldan 'das lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba nyid kyang

sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'o// bcom ldan 'das lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid

kyang lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'o// bcom ldan 'das yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang

yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'o// bcom ldan 'das sa'i khams kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ sa'i khams nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang sa'i khams so// bcom ldan 'das chu'i khams kyang

gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ chu'i khams nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang chu'i khams so// bcom ldan 'das me'i khams kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ me'i khams nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang

me'i khams so// bcom ldan 'das rlung gi khams kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ rlung gi khams nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang rlung gi khams so// bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'i khams kyang gzhan ma lags/

sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ nam mkha'i khams nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang nam mkha'i khams so// bcom ldan 'das rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ rnam par shes pa'i

khams nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'i khams so// bcom ldan 'das ma rig pa yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ ma rig pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang ma rig pa'o// bcom ldan 'das

'du byed kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ 'du byed nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang 'du byed do// bcom ldan 'das rnam par shes pa yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ rnam

par shes pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'o// bcom ldan 'das ming dang gzugs kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ ming dang gzugs nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang ming dang gzugs so// bcom ldan

'das skye mched drug/ kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ skye mched drug nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang skye mched drug go// bcom ldan 'das reg pa yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ reg pa nyid

kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang reg pa'o// bcom ldan 'das tshor ba yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ tshor ba nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang tshor ba'o// bcom ldan 'das sred pa yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang

gzhan ma lags te/ sred pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang sred pa'o// bcom ldan 'das len pa yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ len pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang len pa'o// bcom ldan 'das srid pa yang

gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ srid pa nyid kyang sgyu ma sgyu ma nyid kyang srid pa'o// bcom ldan 'das skye ba yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ skye ba nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang skye ba'o// bcom ldan 'das rga shi

yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ rga shi nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang rga shi'o// bcom ldan 'das sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang

sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang tshul khrims

kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das

brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa

yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang

gzhan ma lags te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das nang stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ nang stong pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid

kyang nang stong pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das phyi stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ phyi stong pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang phyi stong pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang

gzhan ma lags te/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang phyi nang stong pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang

stong pa nyid stong pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das chen po stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ chen po stong pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang chen po stong pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das don dam pa stong pa

nyid kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang don dam pa stong pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/

'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang 'dus byas stong pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang 'dus ma

byas stong pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid do// bcom

ldan 'das thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das dor ba

med pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang dor ba med pa stong pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang

gzhan ma lags te/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang

sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang chos thams cad stong pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid

do// bcom ldan 'das mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang

gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang dngos po med pa stong pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ ngo bo nyid

stong pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang

dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams so// bcom

ldan 'das yang dag par spong pa rnams kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ yang dag par spong ba nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang yang dag par spong ba rnams so// bcom ldan 'das rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyang gzhan ma lags/

sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams so// bcom ldan 'das dbang po rnams kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ dbang po nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma

nyid kyang dbang po rnams so// bcom ldan 'das stobs rnams kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ stobs nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang stobs rnams so// bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi yan lag

rnams kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ byang chub kyi yan lag nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang byang chub kyi yan lag rnams so// bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma

yang gzhan ma lags te/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/

'phags pa'i bden pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams so// bcom ldan 'das bsam gtan rnams kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ bsam gtan nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang bsam

gtan rnams so// bcom ldan 'das tshad med pa rnams kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ tshad med pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang tshad med pa rnams so// bcom ldan 'das gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug

pa rnams kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams so// bcom ldan 'das rnam par thar pa brgyad kyang

gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ rnam par thar pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang rnam par thar pa rnams so// bcom ldan 'das mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan

ma lags te/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams so// bcom ldan 'das rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa

med pa yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang /

smon pa med pa'o// bcom ldan 'das mngon par shes pa rnams kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ mngon par shes pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang mngon par shes pa rnams so// bcom ldan 'das ting nge 'dzin rnams

kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ ting nge 'dzin nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang ting nge 'dzin rnams so// bcom ldan 'das gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ gzungs kyi sgo nyid

kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang gzungs kyi sgo rnams so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang de bzhin

gshegs pa'i stobs rnams so// bcom ldan 'das mi 'jigs pa rnams kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ mi 'jigs pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang mi 'jigs pa rnams so// bcom ldan 'das so so yang dag

par rig pa rnams kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ so so yang dag par rig pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang so so yang dag par rig pa rnams so// bcom ldan 'das snying rje chen po yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang

gzhan ma lags te/ snying rje chen po nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang snying rje chen po'o// bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ sangs rgyas kyi chos

ma 'dres pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams so// bcom ldan 'das rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma

nyid kyang rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'o// bcom ldan 'das lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang lan cig phyir 'ong pa'i 'bras

bu'o// bcom ldan 'das phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o// bcom ldan 'das dgra bcom pa nyid kyang gzhan ma

lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ dgra bcom pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang dgra bcom pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das rang byang chub kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ rang byang chub nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang rang

byang chub bo// bcom ldan 'das lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das rnam pa thams cad mkhyen

pa nyid kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma

la skye ba 'am 'gag pa yod dam// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma la kun nas nyon mongs pa 'am rnam par byang ba yod dam// gsol pa/ bcom

ldan 'das de ni ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ gang la skye ba med cing 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med cing / rnam par byang ba med pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la

slob par 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni mi 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de

ji snyam du sems/ nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga po 'di dag la 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya bar 'du shes dang / brda dang / gdags pa dang / tha snyad du bya ba yin nam// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so//

bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ 'du shes dang / brda dang / gdags pa dang / tha snyad tsam gyis nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga po skye ba'am 'gag pa 'am kun nas nyon mongs pa 'am/ rnam par byang bar

dmigs par 'gyur ram// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni mi 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ gang la 'du shes med cing brda med pa dang / gdags pa med pa dang / tha snyad med

pa dang / ming med pa dang / ming du gdags pa med pa dang / lus med pa dang / lus kyi las med pa dang / ngag med pa dang / ngag gi las med pa dang / yid med pa dang / yid kyi las med pa dang / skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang /

kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram/

gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni mi 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs shing / dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad

mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo // rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ro// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das kyis ji skad du gsungs pa'i don bdag gis 'tshal te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni/ sgyu ma'i

skyes bus bslabs pa ltar/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bslab par bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di lta ste/ phung po lnga po 'di nyid sgyu ma'i skyes bur rig par bgyi ba sha stag go// bcom ldan

'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ phung po lnga po 'di dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni mi 'gyur

ro// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de 'di ltar phung po lnga po rnams ni dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin te/ dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin de ni dmigs su ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal

pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ rmi lam lta bu'i phung po lnga po de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni mi 'gyur

ro// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de 'di ltar rmi lam ni dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin te/ dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin de ni dmigs su ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du

sems/ sgyu ma lta bu'i phung po lnga po de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni mi 'gyur ro// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom

ldan 'das de 'di ltar sgyu ma ni dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin te/ dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin de ni dmigs su ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ sgra brnyan lta bu'i phung po lnga po de

dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni mi 'gyur ro// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de 'di ltar sgra brnyan ni/ dngos

po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin te/ dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin de ni dmigs su ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ mig yor lta bu'i phung po lnga po de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa

la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni mi 'gyur ro// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de 'di ltar mig yer ni dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin te/ dngos po

ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin de ni dmigs su ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ chu zla lta bu'i phung po lnga po de dag/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid

du 'byung bar 'gyur ram// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni mi 'gyur ro// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de 'di ltar chu zla ni dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin te/ dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin de ni dmigs su ma

mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ smig rgyu lta bu'i phung po lnga po de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ gsol

pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni mi 'gyur ro// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de 'di ltar smig rgyu ni dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin te/ dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin de ni dmigs su ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'

stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ sprul pa lta bu'i phung po lnga po de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de ni mi 'gyur ro// de ci'i slad du

zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de 'di ltar sprul pa ni dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin te/ dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin de ni dmigs su ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar gzugs ni rmi lam lta bu/ tshor ba ni rmi lam lta bu/

'du shes ni rmi lam lta bu/ 'du byed ni rmi lam lta bu/ rnam par shes pa ni rmi lam lta bu ste/ rnam par shes pa gang yin pa de ni dbang po drug go/ de ni phung po lnga'o// de dag ni nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// phyi stong pa nyid kyi

phyir mi dmigs so// phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// chen po stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir dmigs so// 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi

dmigs so// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// rang bzhin

stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs

so// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// rab 'byor gzugs ni sgyu ma lta bu/ tshor ba ni sgyu ma lta bu/ 'du shes ni sgyu ma lta bu/ 'du byed ni sgyu ma lta bu/ rnam par shes

pa ni sgyu ma lta bu ste/ rnam par shes pa gang yin pa de ni dbang po drug go// de ni phung po lnga'o// de dag ni nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// phyi stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// stong pa nyid stong

pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// chen po stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// mtha'

las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi

phyir mi dmigs so// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// dngos po

med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// rab 'byor gzugs ni sgra brnyan lta bu/ tshor ba ni sgra brnyan lta bu/ 'du shes ni sgra brnyan lta bu/ 'du byed ni sgra brnyan lta bu/ rnam par shes pa ni sgra brnyan lta

bu ste/ rnam par shes pa gang yin pa de ni dbang po drug go// de ni phung po lnga'o// de dag ni nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// phyi stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi so// phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir dmigs so// stong pa nyid stong

pa nyid kyi phyir dmigs so// chen po stong pa nyid kyi phyir dmigs so// don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir so// 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi phyir so// mtha'

las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi so// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir dmigs so// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi so// chos thams cad stong pa nyid

kyi phyir mi dmigs so// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir dmigs so// mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi so// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir dmigs so// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi so// dngos po

med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// rab 'byor gzugs ni yor lta bu/ tshor ba ni yor lta bu/ 'du shes ni yor lta bu/ 'du byed ni mig yor lta bu/ rnam par shes pa ni yor lta bu ste/ rnam

par shes pa gang yin pa de ni dbang po drug go// de ni phung po lnga'o// de dag ni nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir so// phyi stong pa nyid kyi phyir so// phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir so// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir

so// chen po stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi so// 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid

kyi phyir mi dmigs so// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so/

rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid/

kyi phyir mi dmigs so// rab 'byor gzugs ni chu zla lta bu/ tshor ba ni chu zla lta bu/ 'du shes ni chu zla lta bu/ 'du byed ni chu zla lta bu/ rnam par shes pa ni chu zla lta bu ste/ rnam par shes pa gang yin pa de ni dbang po drug go// de ni phung po lnga'o//

de dag ni nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// phyi stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// chen po stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// don dam pa

stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi

dmigs so// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// mi dmigs pa

stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// rab 'byor gzugs

ni smig rgyu lta bu/ tshor ba ni smig rgyu lta bu/ 'du shes ni smig rgyu lta bu/ 'du byed ni smig rgyu lta bu/ rnam par shes pa ni smig rgyu lta bu ste/ rnam par shes pa gang yin pa de ni dbang po drug go// de ni phung po lnga'o// de dag ni nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi

dmigs so// phyi stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// chen po stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs

so// 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// 'dus byas ma byas stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// dor ba med

pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs

so// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ dmigs so// rab 'byor/ gzugs ni sprul pa lta bu/ tshor ba ni

sprul pa lta bu/ 'du shes ni sprul pa lta bu// 'du byed ni sprul pa lta bu/ rnam par shes pa ni sprul pa lta bu ste/ rnam par shes pa gang yin pa de ni dbang po drug go// de ni phung po lnga'o// de dag ni nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// phyi stong

nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// chen po stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// 'dus byas stong nga nyid kyi phyir

mi dmigs so// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so//

rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi

dmigs so// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta lags na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa la gsar du zhugs

pas/ bstan pa 'di thos na/ 'jigs shing sngang ba dang / skrag par mi 'gyur lags grang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa yang yin la/

shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la thabs kyang mi mkhas pa zhig ste/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi lag tu yang ma 'ongs na/ 'jigs shing sngang ba dang / skrag par yang 'gyur ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen

pos bstan pa 'di thos na/ mi 'jigs mi sngang / mi skrag pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la thabs mkhas pa de gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes

rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang / ldan pa'i sems kyis/ gzugs mi rtag ces bya bar rtog ste/ de mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis/

tshor ba mi rtag ces bya bar rtog ste/ de mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis/ 'du shes mi rtag ces bya bar rtog ste/ de mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis/ 'du byed

mi rtag ces bya bar rtog ste/ de mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis/ rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bya bar rtog ste/ de mi dmigs so// rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab

kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs mkhas pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis/ gzugs sdug bsngal

bya bar de pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to// gzugs sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to// gzugs bdag med ces bya bar de dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to// gzugs zhe zhes bya bar de

dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to// gzugs mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to// gzugs dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to// tshor ba

de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to// rnam par shes pa bdag med ces bya bar/ de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to// rnam par shes pa zhi zhes bya bar de dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to// rnam par shes pa stong zhes

bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to// rnam par shes pa mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to// rnam par shes pa smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to// rnam par shes pa

mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to// rnam par shes pa dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to snyam mo// rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i/ sbyin pa'i

pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ de yod pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de mi 'jigs mi sdang skrag par mi 'gyur ro// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nyan thos

dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang ldan pas/ gzugs gang rtag pa'i rtsam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas gzugs gang

sdug bsngal ba'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/ gzugs gang bdag med pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed

pa gang dben pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do// rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyams pa med pa ste/ de yod pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen

po de mi 'jigs mi sngang skrag par mi 'gyur ro// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ chos de dag la mi rtag pa'i rnam pa dang / sdug bsngal ba'i rnam pa dang / bdag med pa'i

rnam pa dang / zhi ba'i rnam pa dang / stong pa nyid kyi rnam pa dang / mtshan ma med pa'i rnam pa dang / smon pa med pa'i rnam pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i rnam pa dang / dben pa'i rnam par rtogs par byed pa dang / bzod pa dang / mos pa 'di

'byed pa dang // byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ tshor ba stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan

tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyis go mi 'byed pa dang // byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
