dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyis go mi 'byed pa dang // byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/

tshor ba dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyis go mi 'byed pa dang // byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'

chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du shes mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang /

mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyis go mi 'byed pa dang // byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du

shes sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyis go mi 'byed pa dang // byang chub sems dpa' sems

dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du shes bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid

la bya ba dang / mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyis go mi 'byed pa dang // byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid

la bya bas/ 'du shes zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyis go mi 'byed pa dang // byang chub sems dpa'

sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du shes stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i

yid la bya ba dang / mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyis go mi 'byed pa dang // byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i

yid la bya bas/ 'du shes mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyis go mi

'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du shes smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing /

nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyis go mi 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam

rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du shes mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub

kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyis go mi 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du shes dben zhes bya

bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyis go mi 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po

shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du byed mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang

mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyis go mi 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/

'du byed sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyis go mi 'byed pa dang // byang chub sems dpa' sems

dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du byed bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i

yid la bya ba dang / mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyis go mi 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i

yid la bya bas/ 'du byed zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyis go mi 'byed pa dang / byang chub

sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du byed stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs

rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyis go mi 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen

pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du byed mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs

su 'gyur ba gzhan gyis go mi 'byed pa dang // byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du byed smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs

pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyis go mi 'byed pa dang // byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin

pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du byed mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / mi dge ba

de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyis go mi 'byed pa dang // byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du byed dben

zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyis go mi 'byed pa dang // byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab

kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang /

mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyis go mi 'byed pa dang // byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ rnam par

shis pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyis go mi 'byed pa dang // byang chub sems dpa' sems

dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ rnam par shes pa bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i

yid la bya ba dang / mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyis go mi 'byed pa dang // byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid

la bya bas/ rnam par shes pa zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyis go mi 'byed pa dang // byang chub sems

dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas

dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyis go mi 'byed pa dang // byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang

ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ rnam par shes pa mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur

ba gzhan gyis go mi 'byed pa dang // byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ rnam par shes pa smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs

pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyis go ma'i 'byed pa dang // byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la

spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ rnam par shes pa mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / mi

dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyis go mi 'byed pa dang // byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ rnam

par shes pa dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyis go mi 'byed pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'

sems dpa' chen po'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ de yod pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de mi 'jigs mi sngang skrag par mi 'gyur ro// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha

rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ rnam pa 'di ltar rab tu rtog ste/ gzugs kyi stong pa nyid kyis/ gzugs stong pa ma yin gyi/ gzugs nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid

kyang gzugs so// tshor ba'i stong pa nyid kyis/ tshor ba stong pa ma yin gyi/ tshor ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang tshor ba'o// 'du shes kyi stong pa nyid kyis/ 'du shes stong pa ma yin gyi/ 'du shes nyid kyang stong pa nyid do//

stong pa nyid kyang 'du shes so// 'du byed kyi stong pa nyid kyis/ 'du byed stong pa ma yin gyi/ 'du byed nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang 'du byed do// rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid kyis/ rnam par shes pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ rnam

par shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'o// mig gi stong pa nyid kyis/ mig stong pa ma yin gyi/ mig nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang mig go// rna ba'i stong pa nyid kyis/ rna ba stong pa ma yin gyi/

rna ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang rna ba'o// sna'i stong pa nyid kyis/ sna stong pa ma yin gyi/ sna nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang sna'o// lce'i stong pa nyid kyis/ lce stong pa ma yin gyi/ lce nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid

kyang lce'o// lus kyi stong pa nyid kyis lus stong pa ma yin gyi/ lus nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang lus so// yid kyi stong pa nyid kyis/ yid stong pa ma yin gyi/ yid nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang yid do// gzugs

kyi stong pa nyid kyis/ gzugs stong pa ma yin gyi/ gzugs nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang gzugs so// sgra'i stong pa nyid kyis sgra stong pa ma yin gyi/ sgra nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang sgra'o// dri'i stong pa nyid kyis

dri stong pa ma yin gyi/ dri nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang dri'o// ro'i stong pa nyid kyis/ ro stong pa ma yin gyi/ ro nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang ro'o// reg gi stong pa nyid kyis/ reg stong pa ma yin gyi/ reg nyid kyang stong pa nyid

do// stong pa nyid kyang reg go// chos kyi stong pa nyid kyis/ chos stong pa ma yin gyi/ chos nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang chos so// mig gi rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid kyis/ mig gi rnam par shes pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ mig gi rnam

par shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang mig gi rnam par shes pa'o// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid kyis/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang rna

ba'i rnam par shes pa'o// sna'i rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid kyis/ sna'i rnam par shes pa'i stong pa ma yin gyi/ sna'i rnam par shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang sna'i rnam par shes pa'o// lce'i rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid

kyis/ lce'i rnam par shes pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ lce'i rnam par shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang lce'i rnam par shes pa'o// lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid kyis/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ lus

kyi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang lus kyi rnam par shes pa'o// yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid kyis/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang yid

kyi rnam par shes pa'o// mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i stong pa nyid kyis/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang mig gi 'dus te reg pa'o// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i stong pa nyid

kyis/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'o// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i stong pa nyid kyis/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ sna'i 'dus te

reg pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang sna'i 'dus te reg pa'o// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i stong pa nyid kyis/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang / lce'i 'dus te

reg pa'o// lus kyi 'dus te/ reg pa'i stong pa nyid kyis/ lus kyi 'dus te/ reg pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ lus kyi 'dus te/ reg pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'o// yid kyi 'dus

te reg pa'i stong pa nyid kyis/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'o// gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i stong pa nyid kyis/ mig

gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba stong pa ma yin gyi/ gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'o// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i stong pa

nyid kyis/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba stong pa ma yin gyi/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'o// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i

stong pa nyid kyis/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba stong pa ma yin gyi/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'o// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor

ba'i stong pa nyid kyis/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba stong pa ma yin gyi/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'o// lus kyi 'dus

te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i stong pa nyid kyis/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba stong pa ma yin gyi/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'o//

yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i stong pa nyid kyis/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba stong pa ma yin gyi/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor

ba'o// sa'i khams kyi stong pa nyid kyis/ sa'i khams stong pa ma yin gyi/ sa'i khams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang sa'i khams so// chu'i khams kyi stong pa nyid kyis/ chu'i khams stong pa ma yin gyi/ chu'i khams nyid kyang stong pa

nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang chu'i khams so// khams kyi stong pa nyid kyis/ khams stong pa ma yin gyi/ khams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang khams so// rlung gi khams kyi stong pa nyid kyis/ rlung gi khams stong pa ma yin

gyi/ rlung gi khams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang rlung gi khams so// nam mkha'i khams kyi stong pa nyid kyis/ nam mkha'i khams stong pa ma yin gyi/ nam mkha'i khams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang nam mkha'i khams so//

rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi stong pa nyid kyis/ rnam par shes pa'i khams stong pa ma yin gyi/ rnam par shes pa'i khams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'i khams so// ma rig pa'i stong pa nyid kyis/ ma rig pa stong pa

ma yin gyi/ ma rig pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang ma rig pa'o// 'du byed kyi stong pa nyid kyis/ 'du byed stong pa ma yin gyi/ 'du byed nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang 'du byed do// rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid kyis/ rnam par

shes pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ rnam par shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'o// dang gzugs kyi stong pa nyid kyis/ dang gzugs stong pa ma yin gyi/ dang gzugs nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang

dang gzugs so// skye mched drug gi stong pa nyid kyis/ skye mched drug stong pa ma yin gyi/ skye mched drug nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang skye mched drug go// reg pa'i stong pa nyid kyis/ reg pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ reg pa nyid kyang stong pa

nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang reg pa'o// tshor ba'i stong pa nyid kyis/ tshor ba stong pa ma yin gyi/ tshor ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang tshor ba'o// sred pa'i stong pa nyid kyis/ sred pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ sred pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do//

stong pa nyid kyang sred pa'o// len pa'i stong pa nyid kyis/ len pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ len pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang len pa'o// srid pa'i stong pa nyid kyis/ srid pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ srid pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa

nyid kyang srid pa'o// skye ba'i stong pa nyid kyis/ skye ba stong pa ma yin gyi/ skye ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang skye ba'o// rga shi'i stong pa nyid kyis/ rga shi stong pa ma yin gyi/ rga shi nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang rga shi'o//

sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i stong pa nyid kyis/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i stong pa nyid kyis/

tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i stong pa nyid kyis/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu

phyin pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i stong pa nyid kyis/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ brtson 'grus

kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i stong pa nyid kyis/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang

stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i stong pa nyid kyis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang shes

rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// nang stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid kyis/ nang stong pa nyid stong pa ma yin gyi/ nang stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang nang stong pa nyid do// phyi stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid kyis/ phyi stong pa nyid stong pa ma yin gyi/

phyi stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang phyi stong pa nyid do// phyi nang stong pa nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyis/ phyi nang stong pa nyid stong pa ma yin gyi/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang phyi nang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid

stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid kyis/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid stong pa ma yin gyi/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid do// chen po stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid kyis/ chen po stong pa nyid stong pa ma yin gyi/

chen po stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang chen po stong pa nyid do// don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid kyis/ don dam pa stong pa nyid stong pa ma yin gyi/ don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang don dam pa stong pa nyid

do// 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid kyis/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid stong pa ma yin gyi/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang 'dus byas stong pa nyid do// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid kyis/ 'dus

ma byas stong pa nyid stong pa ma yin gyi/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid do// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid kyis/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid stong pa ma yin gyi/

mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid do// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid kyis/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid stong pa ma yin gyi/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong

pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang thog ma dag tha ma med pa stong pa nyid do// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid kyis/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid stong pa ma yin gyi/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang dor ba med

pa stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid kyis/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid stong pa ma yin gyi/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid kyis/ chos

thams cad stong pa nyid stong pa ma yin gyi/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang chos thams cad stong pa nyid do// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid kyis/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid stong pa ma yin gyi/ rang gi

mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid do// pa stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid kyis/ pa stong pa nyid stong pa ma yin gyi/ pa stong pa nyid kyang stong pa

nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang pa stong pa nyid do// dngos po pa stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid kyis/ dngos po pa stong pa nyid stong pa ma yin gyi/ dngos po pa stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang dngos po pa stong

pa nyid do// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid kyis/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid stong pa ma yin gyi/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid kyis/ dngos po

med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid stong pa ma yin gyi/ dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i stong pa nyid kyis/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams stong pa

ma yin gyi/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams so// yang dag par spong ba'i stong pa nyid kyis/ yang dag par spong ba rnams stong pa ma yin gyi/ yang dag par spong ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid

ngo // stong pa nyid kyang yang dag par spong ba rnams so// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'i stong pa nyid kyis/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams stong pa ma yin gyi/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams so// dbang

po'i stong pa nyid kyis/ dbang po rnams stong pa ma yin gyi/ dbang po nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang dbang po rnams so// stobs kyi stong pa nyid kyis/ stobs rnams stong pa ma yin gyi/ stobs nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang stobs

rnams so// byang chub kyi yan lag gi stong pa nyid kyis/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams stong pa ma yin gyi/ byang chub kyi yan lag nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang byang chub kyi yan lag rnams so// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i

stong pa nyid kyis/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'o// 'phags pa'i bden pa'i stong pa nyid kyis/ 'phags

pa'i bden pa rnams stong pa ma yin gyi/ 'phags pa'i bden pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams so// bsam gtan gyi stong pa nyid kyis/ bsam gtan rnams stong pa ma yin gyi/ bsam gtan nyid kyang stong pa nyid

do// stong pa nyid kyang bsam gtan rnams so// tshad pa'i stong pa nyid kyis/ tshad pa rnams stong pa ma yin gyi/ tshad pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang tshad pa rnams so// gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i stong pa

nyid kyis gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams stong pa ma yin gyi/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams so// rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi stong pa nyid kyis/ rnam

par thar pa rnams stong pa ma yin gyi/ rnam par thar pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang rnam par thar pa rnams so// mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'i stong pa nyid kyis/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams stong

pa ma yin gyi/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams so// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa'i stong pa nyid

kyis/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ stong pa nyid kyang rnam

par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa'o// mngon par shes pa'i stong pa nyid kyis/ mngon par shes pa rnams stong pa ma yin gyi/ mngon par shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang mngon par shes pa rnams

so// ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi stong pa nyid kyis/ ting nge 'dzin rnams stong pa ma yin gyi// ting nge 'dzin nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang ting nge 'dzin rnams so// gzungs kyi sgo'i stong pa nyid kyis/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams stong pa ma yin gyi/

gzungs kyi sgo nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ stong pa nyid kyang gzungs kyi sgo rnams so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs kyi stong pa nyid kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams stong pa ma yin gyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ stong

pa nyid kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams so// 'jigs pa'i stong pa nyid kyis/ 'jigs pa rnams stong pa ma yin gyi/ 'jigs pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ stong pa nyid kyang mi 'jigs pa rnams so// so so yang dag par rig pa'i stong pa nyid

kyis/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams stong pa ma yin gyi/ so so yang dag par rig pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang so so yang dag par rig pa rnams so// snying rje chen po'i stong pa nyid kyis/ snying rje chen po stong pa ma yin gyi/ snying rje chen

po nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang snying rje chen po'o// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i stong pa nyid kyis/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams stong pa ma yin gyi/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ stong pa nyid

kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams so// rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i

thabs mkhas pa'o// thabs mkhas pa de dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ bstan pa 'di thos na 'jigs mi sngang skrag par mi 'gyur ro// // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya

pa/ bam po bcu dgu pa// rab 'byor kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa 'di thos na/

'jigs sngang skrag par mi 'gyur ba'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen de gang lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la gzugs rtag ces pa

bar de dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la tshor ba rtag ces bya bar de

pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la 'du shes rtag ces bya bar de

pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor 'jug pa'o// gang de la 'du byed mi rtag ces bya bar de

dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyis 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rnam par shes pa

rtag ces bya bar de pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa ste/ rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub

sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen du rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni gang de la gzugs sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de pa'i tshul

gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la tshor ba sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de pa'i

tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor 'jug pa'o// gang de la 'du shes sdug bsngal zhes bya bar

de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la 'du byed sdug

bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la

rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o//

rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la gzugs bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma

gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la tshor ba bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma

gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la 'du shes bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa

nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la 'du byed bdag med ces bya bar de dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen

pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rnam par shes pa bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad

mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la gzugs zhi zhes bya

bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la

tshor ba zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la

'du shes zhi zhes bya bar de pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor 'jug pa'o// gang de la 'du

byed zhi zhes bya bar de pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor 'jug pa'o// gang de la rnam par

shes pa zhi zhes bya bar de dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang

byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni gang de la gzugs stong zhes bya bar de pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/

rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la tshor ba stong zhes bya bar de dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs

rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la 'du shes stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar

yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la 'du byed stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyis sar yongs su sngor

ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor 'jug pa'o// // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po nyi shu gsum pa// rab 'byor 'di ni byang

chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen du shes par bya ste/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen des yongs su zin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di thos na/ 'jigs/

sdang skrag par mi 'gyur ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa 'di thos na/ 'jigs

shing sdang la skrag par 'gyur zhing thabs mkhas te sdig pa'i grogs po'i lag tu ltung zhing / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su spangs pa lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'

chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom zhing dmigs te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa des rlom sems su byed pa dang //

rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom zhing te/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa des rlom sems su byed pa dang // rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la

bya ba med par/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom zhing te/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa des rlom sems su byed pa dang // rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa

sgom zhing te/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa des rlom sems su byed pa dang // rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom zhing dmigs te/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa

des rlom sems su byed pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa sgom zhing dmigs te/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa des rlom sems su byed pa de lta bu ni/ rab 'byor byang chub

sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs mkhas par rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams

cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ gzugs nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa

sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ gzugs stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul

gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ gzugs chen po stong pa zhes bya

bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyi sa chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med

par/ gzugs don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa

nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ gzugs 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod

pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ gzugs 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//

de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ gzugs mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang

dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ gzugs thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/

dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/

gzugs dor ba pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad

mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ gzugs rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu

phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ gzugs chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid

rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ gzugs pa stong

pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen

pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ gzugs dngos po med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la

spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ gzugs ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//

de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ gzugs dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid

kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la

bya ba par/ tshor ba nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad

mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ tshor ba phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i

tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ tshor ba phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes

rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ tshor ba stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa

nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ tshor ba chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong

pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ tshor ba don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/

'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen

rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ tshor ba mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa

nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ tshor ba thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa zhes bya bar

nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid

dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bar med par/ 'du byed chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la

tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ 'du byed 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes

bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong par nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya

pa med par/ 'du byed mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod

pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ 'du byed thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang

pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ 'du byed rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed

stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ sna rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong

nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang
ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ sna dmigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis pa stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha

rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ sna dngos po pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom

sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ sna ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs

la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ sna dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul

dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ lce nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad

shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ reg thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma med

pa stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ reg dor ba med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed

gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ chos mtha' las 'das pa

rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ chos dngos po pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la// stong pa nyid

pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ chos dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar

yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu

phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ mig gi rnam par shes pa nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom

sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ mig gi rnam par shes pa phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa

nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ gi rnam par shes pa phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid

la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med

par/ gi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la

spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ gi rnam par shes pa chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis

kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ gi rnam par shes pa don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/

dmigs pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/

gi rnam par shes pa/ 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe// rnam pa

thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ gi rnam par shes pa 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang

rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ gi rnam par shes pa mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis

mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ gi rnam par shes pa thog ma dang

tha ma med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad

mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ gi rnam par shes pa dor ba pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis dor ba pa stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi

pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ gi rnam par shes pa rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul kyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid

kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ gi rnam par shes pa/ chos thams cad stong pa/ zhes bya bar yid la byed de/

dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/

gi rnam par shes pa rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/

rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ gi rnam par shes pa pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis pa stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su

byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ gi rnam par shes pa dngos po pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis dngos po pa stong pa

nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ mig gi rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la

byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/

gi rnam par shes pa dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub

sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/

dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa phyi

stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya

ba med par/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa

thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//

de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmigs

la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/

de/ pa'i tshul gyis mi pa stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ lus kyi rnam

par shes pa dngos po pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis dngos po pa stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams

cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes

rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid

stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la

bya ba par/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa

thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha

rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis

kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis stong

pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa chen po stong pa zhes bya

bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/

yid kyi rnam par shes pa don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams

cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi

pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang la/

stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid byed de/

pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba bar/ yid kyi

rnam par shes pa thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam

pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa dor ba pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis dor ba pa stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/

de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong

pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i

tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa

rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen

pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis pa stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab

kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa dngos po pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis dngos po pa stong pa nyid kyang

la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/

pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/

yid kyi rnam par shes pa dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub

sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ gi 'dus te reg pa nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul

gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ gi 'dus te reg pa phyi stong pa zhes bya

bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/

gi 'dus te reg pa phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad

mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ gi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes

rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ gi 'dus te reg pa chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa

nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ gi 'dus te reg pa don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i

tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ gi 'dus te reg pa 'dus byas

stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid

la bya ba par/ gi 'dus te reg pa 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod

pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ gi 'dus te reg pa mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis

kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ gi 'dus te reg pa thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i

tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med

par/ gi 'dus te reg pa dor ba pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis dor ba pa stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/

rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ gi 'dus te reg pa rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//

de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ gi 'dus te reg pa chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang

la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ gi 'dus te reg pa rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar

yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i
yid la bya ba par/ gi 'dus ta reg pa pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis pa stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu

phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ gi 'dus te reg pa dngos po med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa

nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ gi 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs

pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ gi 'dus te reg pa

dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'

sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong

pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa phyi stong pa

zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i

yid la bya ba par/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha

rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa

nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul

phyi sa chen po stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa don dam pa stong

pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang

ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul kyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin

pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid

kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/

pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg

pa thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa

thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dor ba pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//

de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang

dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid

la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba

par/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa nang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol

tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa mi dmigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de// dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/

stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dngos po med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/

dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/

rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams

cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid

kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ sna'i 'dus te reg

pa nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang

ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/

rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//

de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang

la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/
